Google also has made a "mirror" website called elgoog.com. However the full URL is http://www.alltooflat.com/geeky/elgoog/m/index.cgi(but it's easier just to enter elgoog in the google search engine.) It shows the google logo backwards along with many other features, inluding search results. To get the actual search resuslts, you must enter the search query backwards. For example if I want to search something like Wikipedia on elgoog, I would have to type aidepikiW. Typing it in regulary, wikipedia, offers useless results. Only typing it in backwards would you get the same results as in regular google.
